== Naduvannur (CT) (627395) ==

Naduvannur (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 22.2 sq. km. and harbouring 6207 households with total population of 25979 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 450 km. Male population is 12260 and female population is 13719. Scheduled Caste population is 2936 and Scheduled Tribes population is 55. Census Location Code of the town is 627395<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 35 km. Railway station is at Quilandy at a distance of 14 km.
